items.title: ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ Should Have Been ‘Falcon And The Winter Soldier’
items.description: Captain America: Brave New World felt like a worse version of something we’d already seen: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier.

items.title: Mawari And Nankai Electric Railway Bet On AI-Driven Smart Cities In Osaka
items.description: Japan’s third-largest city, Osaka, is set to become a testing ground for AI-driven, extended reality (XR) urban environments.

items.title: Together AI's Valuation Soars To $3.3 Billion As Demand For AI Computing Grows
items.description: Infrastructure startup plans massive GPU deployment amid rising demand for open-source AI models

items.title: Unlocking AI’s Potential: Overcoming Barriers To Adoption
items.description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has evolved from a futuristic concept to a cornerstone of innovation and competitive advantage for businesses.
